Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EmfPaintDevice::EmfPaintDevice ( const QSize &  size,
const QString &  fileName 
)

Constructor to be used in order to save an .emf/.wmf image file.

Parameters:
size the size of the output image
fileName the name of the output file. The file format is automatically guessed from the suffix.

HENHMETAFILE EmfPaintDevice::metaFileHandle (  )  [inline]

Gets a Windows handle to the result metafile. The handle may be NULL. This method sets the metafile object to an invalid state.
